jobs.description: Working in customer operations, helping to build our internal customer relationship management platform and scale  in-app chat, calls and email to over 4 million customers.
key_points: Saved >£10M per year, as the lead backend engineer on multiple customer operations cost saving projects
Reduced calls inbound by >20% by rebuilding our core interactive voice response system
Resolved complex issues as an operations on-call engineer, making use of Grafana, Kibana, Jaeger
Onboarded and upskilled new engineers, supporting them in learning Golang and other core competencies
Built internal microservice directory, which improved developer experience

jobs.description: Building an investment banking equities platform that facilitates multi billion dollar IPOs, including Uber and Slack.
key_points: Worked on converting our monolith equities management application into a suite of RESTful Java Spring microservices
On-call engineer for the Uber IPO, ensuring that any production incidents were resolved quickly and efficiently

jobs.description: Developed academic credential verification system using Hyperledger. Based on MIT’s ‘Blockcerts’ project.

key_points: Completed funded research project titled “ Road Network Load Balancing for Mutli-Agent Informal Fleets“,           presented to Bosch and the UK government department for transport, helping to gain initial seed funding
Facilated the development of multiple patents, working on Java application for multi-objective route planning
Rebuilt core XML abstract library in C++, resulting in 100% backend UNIX compatibility
Implemented error checking into macro scripting language

name: Aran Long
biography: Hi! I’m a software engineer motivated by solving product problems with technology. I’m seeking a senior role, where I can help you build products that will be loved by many

description.description: Ethereum blockchain based credential verification system, awarded the “best use of blockchain” at the largest hackathon in Canada, received pre-seed grant from 1517fund - based in Silicon Valley.
Zero-cost paging system building using a serverless architecture and Amazon dash buttons. Awarded the best use of Amazon Web Services at HackUPC in Barcelona.
Awarded Deezer prize for developing a virality focussed interactive game. Built motion service using Python, SocketIO, OpenCV.
Awarded first-place prize for developing ‘Permission Cloud’. A Blockchain based IOT permissions system developed with Barclays.
Developed, with a team of 10, a speed dating chatbot that featured on the UK TV series. Built the data entry stack, architected the project.
Developed machine learning travel app using Node, Express, React, JS. Likely provoked early release of Google Trips.
Led a team of 10 developers in creating a prototype multi-robot autonomous warehouse system
A charity analytics platform using the Pebble smartwatch, QR scanning and an IOT donation box.
Awarded the Capital One Prize for developing Stock Motion, a gamified stock trading visualisation using the leap motion and the Capital One API.
Developed a data visualisation interactive game based on the influence of Twitter users in a network.
